participant_1.background:

i like the band queens of the stone age.
i listen to linking park , i do not know why.

I love to ride my bike and get ice cream with my grandpa.
I would love to have lunch with Justin Bieber because he is my favorite singer and I would love to learn more about him and his music.
i am a blackjack dealer.
I sometimes stay up late reading horror novels, which can mess up my sleep schedule.

content.text: Hello, what is your favorite song?
Hi, mine is "Sorry" by Justin Bieber. Do you have a favorite artist?
I like the band Queens of the Stone Age.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
Oh, I like rock music. I love the song "Thunderstruck" by AC/DC.
That is a good song! I also like "Free Bird" by Lynyrd Skynyrd.
I love that song too! I'm a big fan of classic rock.
Me too! I love listening to music while I swim.
That must be nice. I don't know how you can swim while listening to music. I'd get distracted.
I've been swimming my whole life, so I'm used to it.
That's impressive. I'm not very good at swimming.
You should take some lessons. It's a lot of fun!
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion
